Reviews.Title: Love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Silverasylum
Reviews.Content: Nice large size makes this phone easy to use. Very sturdy and can get all the aps I want. The shape and size are different than the Verizon model I previously had, but everything else is basically the same.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S 2 II i777 AT&T; - Unlocked - No Contract - ONE YEAR US...
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I have had the phone for a couple weeks now. It has been working very well. For being tech thats a couple years old, the price outways the newer tech in my opinion. Graphics are great, and the speed of the phone is great also. The only issue I have is the Battery consumption which is why I deducted one star. Other than that I am very pleased with the phone...
